name: Huvepharma N.V.
membership: Huvepharma is a member of IFAH-Europe and FEFANA at EU level together with several national federations
goal: Research, development and marketing of veterinary medicines, feed additives and pharmaceutical active substances
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: legislation on veterinary medicines, medicated feed, animal health law, feed and feed additives
